mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods( shopId, typeId, goodsName, goodsStatus, goodsPrice, goodsAmount, goodsPicturePath, goodsPictureInfoPath, goodsVideoPath, goodsUploadTime, goodsModifyTime )VALUES( #{shopId}, #{typeId}, #{goodsName}, '0', #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsAmount}, '', '', '', #{goodsUploadTime}, #{goodsModifyTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goods WHERE shopId = #{shopId} ORDER BY goodsModifyTime DESC
SELECT typeId, goodsName, goodsStatus, goodsPrice, goodsAmount FROM goods WHERE goodsId = #{goodsId}
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET goodsName = #{goods.goodsName}, goodsPrice = #{goods.goodsPrice}, goodsAmount = #{goods.goodsAmount}, typeId = #{goods.typeId}, goodsStatus = #{goods.goodsStatus}, goodsModifyTime = #{goods.goodsModifyTime} WHERE goodsId = #{goodsId}
